relevant_findings.general: in no acute distress, pleasant, cooperative
relevant_findings.HEENT: sclera anicteric, mucus membranes moist, nares clear, trachea at midline
relevant_findings.CV: regular rate, rhythm. No appreciable murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.Abd: well-healed low midline incision consistent with prior colectomy. No evidence of hernia. Focally tender in RLQ without rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.Neuro: alert, oriented to person, place, time
